LD37: Election War

---------------------

This is an action game (for 2 players).
You and your friend play as a candidate for leader of the room.
You have to use campaign tactics to get more supporters than the other.

Game Goal:
Get more supporters than the other player to win the election.

Control:

1.Blue player
Use "W", "A", "S", "D" to move around.
Use "V" to do a self promotion. (affect people around you)
Use "B" to place an advertising board. (affect people around the board)
Use "N" to stun the other player for a while.

2.Red player
Use arrow keys to move around.
Use "I" to do a self promotion. (affect people around you)
Use "O" to place an advertising board. (affect people around the board)
Use "P" to stun the other player for a while.

You can destroy your opponent's advertising board by touching it.
